alert.note: Alert for Beckham; Greer; Harmon; Kiowa; Washita (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 09 at 11:11PM CDT until June 09 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN WASHITA...NORTHWESTERN KIOWA...NORTHERN HARMON... GREER AND BECKHAM COUNTIES... At 1111 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles northeast of Carter to 6 miles northeast of Vinson, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Elk City, Sayre, Mangum, Granite, Erick, Dill City, Carter, Willow, Retrop, Delhi, Vinson and Brinkman. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
